forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds this morning will give way to generally sunny skies for the afternoon. High around 20C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 69F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally clear. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few passing clouds. Low 46F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. High 18C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. High near 65F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain after midnight. Low 9C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain after midnight. Low 49F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 17C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 62F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low near 10C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 49F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 17C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 63F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Some light rain is likely. Low 11C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional light rain. Low 52F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 64F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 49F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High around 60F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 16C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 61F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with showers at times. Low around 45F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A shower or two around the area in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 17C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Chance of a shower or two during the morning, followed by partly cloudy skies in the afternoon. High 63F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 8C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 46F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with a few showers. High 17C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with a few showers. High 63F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 9C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near 6mm.
